vocabInfos.mediumDef:
A man of the tribe of Levi living at the time of Egypt and Wilderness, only mentioned at 1Ch.23.10;
son of: Shimei (H8096);
brother of: Jahath (H3189I), Jeush (H3266J) and Beriah (H1283J); also called Zizah at 1Ch.23.11;
Also named: zi.zah (זִיזָה "Zizah" H2125)
§ Zina = "well-fed"
a Gershonite Levite, second son of Shimei; also called 'Zizah'
vocabInfos._es_Definition: descendiente de Guersón; tribu de Leví
vocabInfos._zh_tw_Definition:
細拿 这个陽性專有名詞在希伯來文的意思是 "飽足的"
一位革順的利未人, 示每的次子; 又稱作細撒 [2125] (代上23:10)
vocabInfos._zh_Definition:
细拿 这个阳性专有名词在希伯来文的意思是 "饱足的"
一位革顺的利未人, 示每的次子; 又称作细撒 [2125] (代上23:10)
